item.title: Soldiers Will Die in Combat – Be Prepared
item.description: A sobering look at the realities of combat, emphasizing the importance of preparation, resilience, and understanding the harsh truths soldiers face on the battlefield.

media:content.media:title: Soldiers Will Die in Combat – Be Prepared
media:content.media:description: A sobering look at the realities of combat, emphasizing the importance of preparation, resilience, and understanding the harsh truths soldiers face on the battlefield.

item.title: Rocky Bleier: From Vietnam to Super Bowl Glory
item.description: Rocky Bleier shares his journey from being wounded in Vietnam to winning four Super Bowls with the Pittsburgh Steelers, highlighting resilience, teamwork, and determination.

media:content.media:title: Rocky Bleier: From Vietnam to Super Bowl Glory
media:content.media:description: Rocky Bleier shares his journey from being wounded in Vietnam to winning four Super Bowls with the Pittsburgh Steelers, highlighting resilience, teamwork, and determination.

item.title: The Other Guys Didn’t Stand a Chance
item.description: Watch an epic showdown where the other competitors didn’t stand a chance, highlighting skill, strategy, and the decisive moves that set the winner apart.

media:content.media:title: The Other Guys Didn’t Stand a Chance
media:content.media:description: Watch an epic showdown where the other competitors didn’t stand a chance, highlighting skill, strategy, and the decisive moves that set the winner apart.

item.title: From the Battlefield – WWII Veteran’s Survival
item.description: Hear a WWII veteran recount harrowing experiences on the battlefield, sharing courage, resilience, and the challenges faced while surviving one of history’s deadliest wars.

media:content.media:title: From the Battlefield – WWII Veteran’s Survival
media:content.media:description: Hear a WWII veteran recount harrowing experiences on the battlefield, sharing courage, resilience, and the challenges faced while surviving one of history’s deadliest wars.

item.title: Why This Navy SEAL Doesn’t Wear the Trident
item.description: Learn why a Navy SEAL chooses not to wear the Trident, sharing personal experiences, values, and insights into the symbolism and meaning behind the iconic insignia.

media:content.media:title: Why This Navy SEAL Doesn’t Wear the Trident
media:content.media:description: Learn why a Navy SEAL chooses not to wear the Trident, sharing personal experiences, values, and insights into the symbolism and meaning behind the iconic insignia.

item.title: From Field Wireman to Door Gunner to Ambushes
item.description: Follow the journey from field wireman to door gunner to running night ambushes, sharing firsthand military experiences, tactics, and the realities of combat.

media:content.media:title: From Field Wireman to Door Gunner to Ambushes
media:content.media:description: Follow the journey from field wireman to door gunner to running night ambushes, sharing firsthand military experiences, tactics, and the realities of combat.

item.title: Korean War Hero Royce Williams’ Epic Dogfight
item.description: Korean War veteran Royce Williams faces seven MiG-15s in a 35-minute dogfight, surviving against the odds and landing his damaged Panther to earn the Medal of Honor.

media:content.media:title: Korean War Hero Royce Williams’ Epic Dogfight
media:content.media:description: Korean War veteran Royce Williams faces seven MiG-15s in a 35-minute dogfight, surviving against the odds and landing his damaged Panther to earn the Medal of Honor.

item.title: USS Pennsylvania’s Mickey Ganitch on Pearl Harbor
item.description: Michael “Mickey” Ganitch, quartermaster and football player aboard the USS Pennsylvania, recalls witnessing the Pearl Harbor attack from his crow’s nest vantage point on December 7, 1941.

media:content.media:title: USS Pennsylvania’s Mickey Ganitch on Pearl Harbor
media:content.media:description: Michael “Mickey” Ganitch, quartermaster and football player aboard the USS Pennsylvania, recalls witnessing the Pearl Harbor attack from his crow’s nest vantage point on December 7, 1941.

item.title: I Saw Things on Iwo Jima I’ll Never Forget
item.description: A firsthand account from Iwo Jima, sharing the unimaginable sights, experiences, and challenges faced during one of WWII’s fiercest battles.

media:content.media:title: I Saw Things on Iwo Jima I’ll Never Forget
media:content.media:description: A firsthand account from Iwo Jima, sharing the unimaginable sights, experiences, and challenges faced during one of WWII’s fiercest battles.

item.title: Heading to Washington to Find a Camp – Then This
item.description: Join the journey to Washington in search of a campsite, and see the unexpected events that unfolded along the way, adding surprises and adventure to the trip.
